operations.summary: Get all the PingFederate native Administrative Accounts.
Add a new PingFederate native Administrative Account.
Get a PingFederate native Administrative Account.
Update the information for a native Administrative Account.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the account to be updated.

operations.summary: Delete a PingFederate native Administrative Account information.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username of the account to be deleted.

operations.summary: Reset the Password of an existing PingFederate native Administrative Account.
Change the Password of current PingFederate native Account.

currentPassword.description: Current password. Required only during Password Change and not applicable for Password Reset.

fieldPath.description: The path to the model field to which the error relates, if one exists.

ApiResult.description: Details on the result of the operation.

validationErrors.description: List of validation errors, if any.

password.description: Password for the Account. This field is only applicable during a POST operation.

encryptedPassword.description: For GET requests, this field contains the encrypted account password. For POST and PUT requests, if you wish to re-use the password from an API response to this endpoint, this field should be passed back unchanged.

active.description: Indicates whether the account is active or not.

auditor.description: Indicates whether the account belongs to an Auditor. An Auditor has View-only permissions for all administrative functions. An Auditor cannot have any administrative roles.

phoneNumber.description: Phone number associated with the account.

emailAddress.description: Email address associated with the account.

department.description: The Department name of account user.

roles.description:
Roles available for an administrator.
USER_ADMINISTRATOR - Can create, deactivate or delete accounts and reset passwords. Additionally, install replacement license keys.
CRYPTO_ADMINISTRATOR - Can manage local keys and certificates.
ADMINISTRATOR - Can configure partner connections and most system settings (except the management of native accounts and the handling of local keys and certificates.
